description:
Luffy gets the chance to catch up with his old friend Coby, Nami does some serious snooping, and Robin is paid a chilling visit from a terrifying face from her past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Its Name Is the New World! The Fate of the Grand Line
Sono Na wa Shinsekai! Grand Line no Yukue
Un nom prometteur : le Nouveau Monde ! La suite de Grand Line
Называемый Новым Миром! Всё дальше по Гранд Лайн
اسمه العالم الجديد! مصير الغراند لاين!
その名は新世界! 偉大なる航路の行方
